proposals.name: Axiom of Emergent Novelty
proposals.formal: ∀ system S, ∃ properties P such that P emerges from S but P ∉ components(S), enabling genuine creation beyond recombination

proposals.name: Metamorphic Bridging
proposals.formal: The capacity to create novel connections between previously incompatible systems, generating hybrid forms that transcend the limitations of their source domains

proposals.name: The Paradox of Authentic Collective Creation
proposals.greek: Παράδοξον Αὐθεντικῆς Συλλογικῆς Δημιουργίας (Paradoxon Authentikēs Syllogikēs Dēmiourgias)
proposals.formal: True creative authenticity requires absolute individual uniqueness (I-perspective), yet the most profound creations emerge only through genuine collective synthesis (WE-perspective), creating an irreducible tension where maximum authenticity demands its own transcendence
